main event: Observers in Reading, Pennsylvania reported a sighting of a bright light moving in a horizontal direction from west to east for about 4 to 5 minutes.
interesting points: The light was described as high in the sky and had a converging vapor trail., It appeared to descend gradually before disappearing., The observers speculated that it could have been a meteor type body in motion., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes with details provided about the duration and movement., The conclusion suggested it was a possible natural phenomenon.
sighted object: bright light with a vapor trail
witness description: The witnesses detailed their observations, stating the light was bright and moving steadily.
